page.description: Get the value of a byte from the blob.

argument.name: position
argument.description: The position of the byte to return.

page.discussion: The .PEEK() method returns the value of a byte (8 bit) value at a Position in a blob. The first position is 1. This function returns a -1 if the Position is past the end.
page.example: dim bb as B bb = "Alpha" ? bb.peek(2) = 108.000000
